certifications.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Certified Generative AI Professional

projects.name: Virtual Clothing Trial Room
projects.description: Engineered a real-time virtual trial system using OpenCV and CVzones PoseDetector for online shopping. Integrated pose detection and image overlay to provide a realistic and interactive clothing try-on experience. Boosted user satisfaction and engagement by allowing visualization of clothing fit before purchase, increasing user interaction and reducing return rates by 30%.

projects.name: ElectroWatt
projects.description: ElectroWatt revolutionized eco-friendly transport by facilitating bookings with real-time tracking and optimized management to meet sustainability goals. Enhanced access to electric vehicles, maintenance services, and charging stations, promoting greener mobility through data-driven business analysis for improved user experience.

projects.name: DetectiX - Object Detection System
projects.description: Developed a real-time object detection system using deep neural networks (DNN) for live video streams. Optimized surveillance and automation by implementing real-time object detection with visual bounding box overlays.

experiences.description: Conducted IQ, OQ, and PQ validation processes to ensure adherence to FDA 21 CFR Part 11 regulations, maintaining data integrity and supporting risk management. Authored and managed validation reports, SOPs, and audit documentation to reinforce organizational compliance and regulatory standards.

experiences.role_name: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Engineer | AIML Intern
experiences.description: Implemented Machine Learning models, achieving high accuracy in predictive analytics. Enhanced data analysis and model training, increasing efficiency by 20%. Conducted comprehensive data preprocessing and feature engineering for optimal model performance.
